headline: DAT: Uncertainty looms despite a steady January for truckload freight
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., February 13, 2025--Spot truckload freight volumes increased in January as shippers replenished inventories after the holidays, pulled forward imports ahead of potential tariffs, and sought more flexible, short-term capacity on the spot market to cope with disruptive winter weather, said DAT Freight & Analytics, which operates the DAT One freight marketplace and DAT iQ data analytics service.
